ScenPartDef.label: start in world
ScenPartDef.description: Forces the game to start in a world generated from a specific preset, skipping the world selection screen.

ScenPartDef.label: spawn landmark on globe percentage
ScenPartDef.description: Spawns a specific type of landmark on a percentage of tiles across the entire world.

ScenPartDef.label: spawn landmark on starting tile
ScenPartDef.description: Spawns a specific type of landmark on the player's starting tile.
